app.name: Zendesk Macro Management Extension
app.long_description: An integration for managing Zendesk Macros.
app.installation_instructions: To install the Zendesk Macro Management Extension, follow the instructions in the README file provided with the app. Ensure that your Zendesk account has the necessary permissions to modify data. After installation, configure the app by entering your admin email, Zendesk subdomain, and API token.

email.label: Email
email.helpText: Enter the admin email address for integration.

api_token.label: API Token
api_token.helpText: Provide the API token for authenticating requests.
